venue.address_2: about two miles east of Lowe's Store
venue.name: Appalachia Trailhead parking lot

item.description:
Hike the beautiful Valley Way trail to the Madison Springs Hut and if you are game, Mt Madison.  

 

Event Description: Valley Way from the Appalachia trailhead to Madison Spring Hut, followed by the Osgood Trail to the summit. 8.4 miles round-trip, 4,100 feet of elevation gain, book time: 6:15.

Be prepared for a variety of trail conditions. It may be spring at the base and still winter at the summit. pack your traction and maybe snowshoes- it depends on this weeks weather. it changes daily!  The trail itself does not get challenging until you reach the hut...then its the big boulders to the summit. Those not caring to summit can picnic and take in the views at the hut, not open yet.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the trailhead or suggested carpool:
item.name: Let's Hike.....Valley Way Trail to Mt Madison
